prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant colors and cheerful expressions.
Imagine a Pokemon that glows in the dark and loves to dance in the moonlight.
Show me a small, winged Pokemon that collects flowers and spreads joy.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body and expressive eyes that can fly gracefully.
Design a bug-type Pokemon that thrives in lush environments and attracts other creatures.
Give me a Pokemon that has a unique color scheme, making it stand out in the wild.
